title: PlayStation Reveals PSVR2 Release Window - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.22.22
description:
Tim and Blessing talk about PSVR 2 coming early 2022, Opening Night Live final predictions, and Destiny 2 Lighfall looks really cool!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:07 - Housekeeping

Right after this is our live reactions to Gamescom Opening Night Live! So if you’re watching this live on Twitch, don’t touch that dial because we’ll be rolling right into that. If you’re listening later, the reaction video will be up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames


We also got an all new episode of the Kinda Funny Podcast featuring our first date dos and donts. Catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFUnny and podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report  -

00:06:07 - PSVR 2 Will Be Released in Early 2023
00:16:10 - Sega seems to leak the Sonic Frontiers release date
00:19:15 - Bungie reveals Destiny 2: Lightfall
00:28:37 - Ad
00:29:37 - A Borderlands thing is showing up at Gamescom Opening Night Live
00:31:07 - Twitch announced the end of their exclusivity clause
00:34:29 - Sakurai has ended his daily Smash screenshots
00:41:20 - Nintendo Treehouse: Live featuring Splatoon 3 and Harvestella announced
00:47:15 - Out today
00:50:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim
